A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I liked every single star wars movie but this one just was anticlamactic\, ruined every mystery\, and turned the force into something really boring somehow. It was a long movie but very little happened. No cool aliens or alien worlds\, no sense in the decisions of some characters\, pointless scenes\, and felt low budget for a star wars movie. Whoever is praising it must have been paid. This movie was a disappointment.
